name: Walk Like An Egyptian
summary: BANGLES Walk Like An Egyptian (1986 UK 2-track 7 vinyl single also including Not Like You housed within a fold-out poster sleeve. The sleeve has some light storagewear and the vinyl shows a few surface scuffs but this should not affect playand remains in excellent condition)
